body: Yo! Wow the website looks amazing! I am gonna keep this short because i have 15 mins wifi. How are things going can't wait till i get back and try avicore! One quick thing my staff app has dissapeared! Congrats to anyone who got promoted see you all next Wednesday! Byeee <3
